name: Weapons and Melons
description: Weapons and Melons. Is Part 1 of 5 of the series ‘The Time I Went Inside My Head And Saw Japan.’  The series is a collection of heavily detailed scenes created from memories of a place I have only seen inside my head, that I have imagined into reality. Hand drawn frame by frame Animated gif (copyright)@omgidrawedit. For personal non commercial use only. Find me on Instagram and Twitter @omgidrawedit
